Electricity ​

Static electricity ​

charge 电荷

electron 电子 (-) 能动 Atom

  • nucleus 荷
    • neutron 中子
    • proton 质子

coulomb 库伦

Insulator 绝缘体 ​

--- Friction

insulated conductor

导体接地消电 如果带正电，会把负电吸回来 如果带负电，会把负电退回去

unlike charges attract 异性相吸 like charges repel 同性相斥 repulsion repulsion attraction attraction neutrally charged attraction

electric field ​

正电 电场线朝外 负电 电场线朝内

电场线表示正电荷的方向

电场强度随随电场距离增大而减小

平行电极板 parallel charged plate

电流 charge ​

  1. conventional flow
  2. flow of electron

Resistor ​

  • ohmic resistor
    • L-V graph was a straight line
      • is not gradient, R =
  • non-ohmic
    • L-V graph was a curve

电路 ​

元器件 ​

  1. 电源
    1. DC : direct current 直流电
      1. cell (dry) 干电池
    2. AC : Alternating current 交流电 o~o
  2. resister
    1. fixed resistor
    2. varriable resistor
    3. potential divider
    4. thermister 热敏电阻
    5. Light Dependent Resister (LDR) 光敏电阻
  3. 仪表
    1. V
    2. A
  4. fuse

    • is inversely proportional to
  • serirs 串联
    • is directly proportional to
